content:
path /workload/v1/stacks/stackid/workloads/workloadid
operationId UpdateWorkload
parameters
name stackid
description A stack ID or slug
in path
required True
schema
type string
name workloadid
description An EdgeCompute workload ID
in path
required True
schema
type string
summary Update a workload
requestBody
v1UpdateWorkloadRequest
type object
v1Workload
type object
properties
stackId
type string
readOnly True
description The ID of the stack that a workload belongs to
id
type string
readOnly True
description A workloads unique identifier
name
type string
description A workloads name as it appears in the StackPath portal
slug
type string
description A workloads programmatic name

Workload slugs are used to build its instances names
v1Metadata
type object
properties
v1StringMapEntry
type string
description A string to string key/value pair
createdAt
type string
format datetime
readOnly True
description The date that a metadata entry was created
nullable True
updatedAt
type string
format datetime
readOnly True
description The date that a metadata entry was last updated
nullable True
deleteRequestedAt
type string
format datetime
readOnly True
description The date an entity was requested to be deleted
nullable True
version
type string
description A metadata entrys version number

Metadata versions start at 1 when they are created and increment by 1 every time they are updated
description Metadata associated with an entity
v1WorkloadSpec
type object
properties
networkInterfaces
type array
v1NetworkInterface
type object
network
type string
description A network interfaces name
description Network interfaces that will be created on instances in the workload
description Network interfaces to bind to the workloads instances
v1ContainerSpecMapEntry
type object
v1ContainerSpec
type object
properties
image
type string
description The location of a Docker image to run as a container
command
type string
description The commands that start a container
v1EnvironmentVariableMapEntry
type object
v1EnvironmentVariable
type object
properties
value
type string
description An environment variables value
secretValue
type string
description A sensitive environment variable that should not be exposed
description The location to obtain a value for an environment variable
description A string to environment variable key/value pair
v1InstancePortMapEntry
type object
v1InstancePort
type object
properties
port
type integer
format int32
description The network port
protocol
type string
description The network protocol for the port

Values are either TCP or UDP Defaults to TCP
enableImplicitNetworkPolicy
type boolean
format boolean
description Allow the internet to connect to the port

When true this port will be given an implicit network policy of priority 65534 permitting 0000/0 access to the port This can be overridden by creating network policies of a higher priority to block the port
description A named port for an instance of a workload
description A string to network port key/value pair
v1Probe
type object
properties
v1HTTPGetAction
type object
properties
path
type string
description The path portion of the URL to request
port
type integer
format int32
description The TCP port to query in the HTTP request
scheme
type string
description HTTP scheme to use in the HTTP request
v1StringMapEntry
type string
description A string to string key/value pair
description Execute an HTTP GET request against an endpoint running on an instance
v1TCPSocketAction
type object
port
type integer
format int32
description The TCP port to quert
description Connect to an instances TCP port
initialDelaySeconds
type integer
format int32
description The number of seconds after a workload instance has started before liveness probes are initiated
timeoutSeconds
type integer
format int32
description The number of seconds after which a probe times out

Defaults to 1 second Minimum value is 1
periodSeconds
type integer
format int32
description How often in seconds to perform a probe

Default to 10 seconds Minimum value is 1
successThreshold
type integer
format int32
description The minimum consecutive successes for a probe to be considered successful after having failed

Defaults to 1 Must be 1 for liveness Minimum value is 1
failureThreshold
type integer
format int32
description The minimum consecutive failures for a probe to be considered failed after having succeeded

Defaults to 3 Minimum value is 1
description A health check probe against a workload instance to determine if it is alive or ready to receive traffic
v1ResourceRequirements
type object
properties
v1StringMapEntry
type string
description A string to string key/value pair
description Resource requirements for an object

Resource requirements are key/value pairs
volumeMounts
type array
v1InstanceVolumeMount
type object
properties
slug
type string
description The slug of the volume claim to mount
mountPath
type string
description The path in an instance to mount a volume
description Describes mounting a volume on containers or vms in an instance
description Volumes to mount in the container
description The specification for the desired state of a container in a workload
description A string to container configuration key/value pair
v1VirtualMachineSpecMapEntry
type object
v1VirtualMachineSpec
type object
properties
image
type string
description The image to use for the virtual machine

This is in the format of / If the image tag portion is omitted default is assumed which is the most recently created ready and nondeprecated image of that slug A set of common images is present on the stackpathedge stack
userData
type string
format base64
description Base64 encoded cloudinit compatible userdata

v1VolumeClaimSpec
type object
v1ResourceRequirements
type object
properties
v1StringMapEntry
type string
description A string to string key/value pair
description Resource requirements for an object

Resource requirements are key/value pairs
description The specification for a volume claim
VolumeClaimVolumeClaimPhase
type string
default VOLUMECLAIMPHASEUNSPECIFIED
description Which phase a volume claim is currently in

 VOLUMECLAIMPHASEUNSPECIFIED StackPath is unable to determine the volume claims state
  PENDING The volume claim is pending
  UNBOUND The volume claim is unbound
  BOUND The volume claim is bound to an instance
description A claim for a volume

Volumes may be attached to workload instance containers or virtual machines
description A list of claims that instances may reference

The slug of the claim will be used in combination with the name of the instance to create a stable identifier The slug should be used in the volume mount specifications for containers and VMs
v1WrappedImagePullCredentials
type array
v1ImagePullCredential
type object
v1DockerRegistryCredentials
type object
properties
server
type string
description The server that the credentials should be used with

The server that the credentials should be used with This value will default to the docker hub registry when not set
username
type string
description The username that should be used for authenticate the image pull
password
type string
description The password that should be used to authenticate the image pull
email
type string
description The email address to use for the docker registry account
description The authentication configuration that should be used to pull images from a docker registry
description The credentials that should be used to pull the container image
description The credentials needed to pull a container image
description The specification for the desired state of a workload
v1TargetMapEntry
type object
v1Target
type object
v1TargetSpec
type object
properties
deploymentScope
type string
description The scope at which a deployment should be created Valid values are cityCode
v1DeploymentSpec
type object
properties
minReplicas
type integer
format int32
description The minimum number of instances in a deployment
maxReplicas
type integer
format int32
description The maximum number of instances in a deployment
v1ScaleSettings
type object
metrics
type array
v1MetricSpec
type object
properties
metric
type string
description The metric to measure against
averageValue
type string
description The target average value for the metric measured across all instances within a deployment expressed as a quantity
averageUtilization
type integer
format int32
description The target average value for the metric measured across all instances within a deployment expressed as a percentage of requested resources
description Metrics to observe for invoking scaling events
selectors
type array
v1MatchExpression
type object
properties
key
type string
description The name of the selector to perform a match against
operator
type string
description The operation to perform to match a selector

Valid values are In NotIn Exists and DoesNotExist
values
type string
description The values to match in the selector
description An expression to match selectors against a set of values
description A collection of filters that match the deployments scope
description A deployments specification
description The specification for a target
description How instances in a workload should be deployed
description A string to deployment target key/value pair
v1WorkloadStatus
type string
default ACTIVE
description Which status a workload is currently in

 ACTIVE The workload is active
  SUSPENDED The workload is suspended
  BILLINGSUSPENDED The workload is suspended due to nonpayment
  INACTIVE The workload is inactive or has been deleted
description A computing workload

Workloads define a computing application to deploy to StackPaths edge network
required True
responses
200
